fields.name: enableAutoBatch
fields.description: Enable auto batching of packets from sensors when no live sessions are active

fields.description: The default batching amount (packets from sensor) when Auto Batch is disabled

fields.name: autoBatchAmount
fields.description: The amount of packets to batch when sensors are set to batch mode

fields.description: Enable dev mode, allowing manual occupancy changes via API

Mutation.name: Mutation
Mutation.description: The mutation type, represents all updates we can make to our data

fields.name: addSpaceType
fields.description: Add a new space type

fields.name: updateSpaceType
fields.description: Update an existing space type

fields.name: deleteSpaceType
fields.description: Delete an existing space type

fields.name: addNewFloorPlan
fields.description: Add a new floor plan to a floor

fields.name: updateFloor
fields.description: Update the details of the current active floor plan (or the active floor plan at currentDate)

fields.name: addSpacesToFloor
fields.description: Add multiple spaces to a floor plan. Return context is all spaces for the given floor

fields.name: removeSpaceGroupFromSpace
fields.description: Remove the assigned space group from the given space

fields.name: updateSpaceOnFloor
fields.description: Update a mapped space area on a floor. Any updates to a shape change the shape for the whole time it has existed (startDate). If you want to make end of life this shape. Delete it and add a new shape

fields.name: removeSpaceOnFloor
fields.description: Remove a space from the floor

fields.name: purgeFloorSpace
fields.description: Purge a floor space from the database permanently

fields.name: addSpacesToGroup
fields.description: Assign spaces to a space group (e.g. neighborhood

fields.name: removeSpaceGroup
fields.description: Remove a space group. Note if the space group has never had any spaces assigned to it the group will be deleted. Otherwise it's endDate will be set to the one provide or now.

fields.name: addLocation
fields.description: Add a new location, which is a building or site at an address

fields.name: updateLocation
fields.description: Update an existing location, which is a building or site at an address

fields.name: detachSpaceFromELabel
fields.description: Remove the floorSpace from the given eLabel

fields.name: removeCustomerFromELabel
fields.description: Set the given eLabel to belong to no customer

fields.name: deleteLiveDashboard
fields.description: Delete a Live Dashboard

fields.name: addSpaceCapacityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Add Space Capacity Live Dashboard

fields.name: updateSpaceCapacityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Update Space Capacity Live Dashboard

fields.name: addFloorAreaAvailabilityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Add Floor Area Availability Live Dashboard

fields.name: updateFloorAreaAvailabilityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Update Floor Area Availability Live Dashboard

fields.name: addFloorSpaceCapacityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Add Floor Space Live Dashboard

fields.name: updateFloorSpaceCapacityLiveDashboard
fields.description: Update Floor Space Capacity Live Dashboard

fields.name: addWebhook
fields.description: Update a Webhook

fields.name: updateWebhook
fields.description: Update Webhook

fields.name: deleteWebhook
fields.description: Delete a Webhook

fields.name: enableOpenIDSso
fields.description: Add SSO Integration with OpenID Connect identity provider

fields.name: disableOpenIDSso
fields.description: Delete SSO Integration with OpenID Connect identity provider

fields.name: updateDefaultClaims
fields.description: Update default claims for new SSO users

fields.name: addUser
fields.description: Add and invite a user to the application with a set of permissions

fields.name: editUser
fields.description: Edit a user attributes and permissions

fields.name: resendUserInvitation
fields.description: Resend a user's invitation and reset their temporary password

fields.name: archiveUser
fields.description: Archive user from system removing their access

fields.name: addApiKey
fields.description: Add a new API key with a set of permissions

fields.name: editApiKey
fields.description: Edit a API keys permissions

fields.name: archiveApiKey
fields.description: Archive API key removing their access

fields.name: depersonateCustomer
fields.description: Depersonate an impersonated customer

PageInfo.name: PageInfo
PageInfo.description: Metadata about a page of data

fields.name: endCursor
fields.description: Last cursor in the page. Use this as the next from argument

fields.name: startCursor
fields.description: Start cursor in the page. Use this to go backwards with the before argument

fields.name: hasNextPage
fields.description: If there is more data after this page

fields.name: hasPreviousPage
fields.description: If there is data previous to this page

PointInput.name: PointInput
PointInput.description: Represents a point as doubles (floating point number) in 2D space (x,y)

Query.name: Query
Query.description: The query type, represents all of the entry points into our object graph

fields.name: partner
fields.description: Return a Partner by its Id

fields.name: customer

fields.description: Return a list of active SpaceGroups

fields.name: floorSpaces

User.name: User
User.description: Information about users that have application access

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique ID for user

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of user

fields.name: accessClaims
fields.description: Access user have

fields.name: created
fields.description: Date user was created

fields.name: lastUpdated
fields.description: Date user was last updated including loggin in

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: If user is enabled (has access)

fields.name: external
fields.description: True if user identity is managed by federated identity provider.

fields.name: confirmed
fields.description: True if user identity is managed by XY Sense and user has accepted the account invitation

fields.name: customerId
fields.description: Customer ID the user belongs to

fields.name: partnerId
fields.description: Partner ID the user belongs to

fields.name: email
fields.description: Email of user

fields.name: pictureUrl
fields.description: URL to a picture for the user

fields.name: customer
fields.description: Details of the customer the user belongs to

fields.name: partner
fields.description: Details of the partner the user belongs to

fields.name: source
fields.description: Source of the user entity

fields.name: signatureSecret
fields.description: Secret used to sign requests. Not signed if null/empty.
